name: Suspect
description: Blue - PUI (mild, Severe, critical) hasn’t tested yet.

name: Probable
description: Yellow - PUI (mild, Severe, critical) Perform Testing and waiting for results.

name: Confirmed
description: Red - COVID-19 test with Positive result

name: Negative
description: Green - COVID-19 test with Positive result

name: Recovered
description: Green - COVID-19 test with Positive result
